abstract: A view of the march across the Brooklyn Bridge, from the bridge's roadway to a bus filled with those arrested.
snippet: A view of the march across the Brooklyn Bridge, from the bridge's roadway to a bus filled with those arrested.
lead_paragraph: #OccupyWallStreet I got let go. After hours on police bus. Most ppl still handcuffed on buses. Trying to find space for us in precinctsSun Oct 02 01:49:05 via Twitter for BlackBerry®Natasha Lennardnatashalennard

headline.main: Covering the March, on Foot and in Handcuffs
